title: Fixing Cook Errors
why: Cook errors are the most common cause of packaging failures. They occur when assets have broken references, invalid data, or missing dependencies.

items: Fix Up Redirectors: Right-click Content folder > Fix Up Redirectors in Folder
Validate Assets: Right-click Content > Asset Actions > Validate Assets
Re-save any assets showing warnings in the editor
Run packaging again and confirm the specific cook error is resolved
